subject: Pro X Ultra Pedal Control Box
description_text:
Hi I am thinking of purchasing the full pedal pro vibration kit and have
question. How does the Pro X Ultra Pedal Control Box connect to computer
what cable do I need as it doesn't show in picture or does it all come with
cables, 3 motors and power pack if I pick the best package. Can you email
me everything you can about the control box and pro kit. Thank you

conversations.body_text: Hi Michael Cadwallader,  Sorry for the late reply, yes, it will include all the necessary accessories, you just need to connect everything to the pedalÂ control box and then connect the control box to the PC via USB3.0
